Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Avatar Boulevard, just west of Altihmin's Academy.
Room.LongDescription: Altihmin's Academy of Advanced Fighting Techniques is a large facility where very high level fighters go to train. Training is very difficult at high levels for fighters as they must prove themselves by fighting a similar fighter of a more powerful level. Only through this test can any fighter advance to the higher levels.
